member.summary: Gets or sets whether to enable metrics. Default is false.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.Configuration.EndpointOptions.DelayedRetryCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the delayed retry count. Default is 3.

member.name: P:ClearMeasure.HostedEndpoint.Configuration.EndpointOptions.DelayedRetryTimeIncrease
member.summary: Gets or sets the delayed retry time increase. Default is 10 seconds.
